Variable.Name: Ability To Invest In Future Proofing

Variable.Name: Artificial Input Usage

Variable.Name: Availability Of Crop Residues

Variable.Name: Exported Crop Production Emissions

Variable.Name: Farmers Exiting The Sector

Variable.Name: Food Waste

Variable.Name: International Commodity Prices
